FuncDef: The display ike peer command displays the configuration of IKE peer.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of IKE peer.
It is a string of 1 to 15 case sensitive characters.

displays the brief configuration information of IKE peer.
-

ExtraInfo:
The output of the display ike peer command provides the following information:
Name of the IKE peerNegotiation modeAuthentication keyCertificate file nameIKE proposalType of the local IDIP address of the peerName of the VPN instanceIKE versionRemote ID of IKE peerWhether NAT traversal is enabled
